title: Gardener

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a plant to grow each day.
- Choose a plant to use each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Plants can be used the second night after they're grown.
- You can't grow a plant on Day 1.

fields.name: Plants:
fields.value:
- Yarrow: Grants the target Powerful defense against attacks other than from Werewolves, Weres, Vampires, or Coven members.
- Wolfsbane: Grants target Powerful Defense against Werewolves and Weres. Will kill attacking Werewolves/Weres. Will kill Werewolf/Were if used on it.
- Garlic: Grants target Powerful Defense against Vampires. Will kill attacking Vampire. Will kill Vampire if used on it.
- Witch Hazel: Grants target Powerful defense against attacks from Coven members and cures poison.
- Deadly Nightshade: Deals Powerful attack to target. If used on Town member, all plants lose killing properties.
